name: Organic Apples
description: Fresh organic apples picked from the farm. Perfect for snacking, baking, or making homemade applesauce.

name: Whole Grain Bread
description: Nutritious whole grain bread made with organic flour and no preservatives. Ideal for toast, sandwiches, or french toast.

name: Organic Brown Rice
description: High-quality brown rice that is gluten-free and packed with fiber. Perfect for stir-fries, salads, or as a side dish.

name: Organic Whole Milk
description: Creamy, delicious whole milk from happy cows. Ideal for cooking, baking, or drinking on its own.
